channel.title: rk3328 on Fabrice Aneche

item.title: H96 Max+ Android box as a Linux server
item.description: The H96 Max + is an Android 8.1 box with a Rockchip 3328, 4Gb RAM and 32G or 64G builtin eMMC, it’s the same chipset as the Rock64, it costs around 60 USD. The only downside of this board is the 100Mb network link, can be a non issue using a USB network adapter. July 2020 EDIT: Works with mainline, look at the bottom. Here are some notes how to install Arch Linux on the H96 to make it a small server appliance.
